channel.title: DJ Sadat Valentine aka da War1ock Presents UMR Breakbeat Radio
channel.description: Dj Sadat Valenitne aka da War1ock plays a variety of Hiphop, Breakbeat, Electro House, Drum & Bass and Dubstep.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Electro House, Breakbeat, Dubstep and Jungle
channel.itunes:author: Sadat Valentine aka da War1ock
channel.itunes:summary: Dj Sadat Valenitne aka da War1ock plays a variety of Hiphop, Breakbeat, Electro House, Drum & Bass and Dubstep.

item.title: Electro House & Breakz - DJ Sadat Valentine aka da War1ock - Episode 10
item.description: Happy New Year and Welcome everyone to show #10. This week we have some of my favorite samples, loops, original tracks and dance floor explosions I will be rocking this year. Thank you all for all your emails and keep them coming.
item.dc:creator: Sadat Valentine aka da War1ock
item.itunes:summary: Happy New Year and Welcome everyone to show #10. This week we have some of my favorite samples, loops, original tracks and dance floor explosions I will be rocking this year. Thank you all for all your emails and keep them coming.

item.title: Sadat Valentine aka da War1ock Presents Urban Mafia Radio (Dubstep Breakbeat EP #9)
item.description: Welcome everyone to show #9. This week we are going on a musical journey from Dubstep to Breakbeat to Electro and even the kitchen sink. So grab someone and get ready....it's going to be a bumpin ride.
item.dc:creator: Sadat Valentine aka da War1ock
item.itunes:summary: Welcome everyone to show #9. This week we are going on a musical journey from Dubstep to Breakbeat to Electro and even the kitchen sink. So grab someone and get ready....it's going to be a bumpin ride.

item.title: DJ Sadat Valentine aka da War1ock Present UMR (Phatbeatsandbreakz Breakbeat & House Episode 8)
item.description: Phatbeatsandbreakz is a series of breakbeat & house mixes I did a few years ago. Over the next few weeks I will be making these availible on the show and for downloads. I hope you enjoy them. Full mixes, tracks and shows at Facebook Please join me and INTERACT WITH ME ON MY OFFICIAL FAN PAGE (Hit the LIKE Button) for free downloads and tour info. http://www.facebook.com/pages/Sadat-Valentine-aka-da-War1ock/134221649959653?v=app_7146470109&ref=sgm
item.dc:creator: Sadat Valentine aka da War1ock
item.itunes:summary:
Phatbeatsandbreakz is a series of breakbeat & house mixes I did a few years ago. Over the next few weeks I will be making these availible on the show and for downloads. I hope you enjoy them.
Full mixes, tracks and shows at Facebook
Please join me and INTERACT WITH ME ON MY OFFICIAL FAN PAGE (Hit the LIKE Button) for free downloads and tour info.

item.title: DJ Sadat Valentine aka da War1ock Presents Urban Mafia Radio (Breakbeat Mix - Episode 7)
item.description: Yes I am back and in EFFECT and 2010 is coming to a close fast. Lets get this started with a lil Breakbeat quick mix. Get ready for next weeks full show and mix. Be sure to chek out my facebook fan page for more mixes and music.
item.dc:creator: Sadat Valentine aka da War1ock
item.itunes:summary: Yes I am back and in EFFECT and 2010 is coming to a close fast. Lets get this started with a lil Breakbeat quick mix. Get ready for next weeks full show and mix. Be sure to chek out my facebook fan page for more mixes and music.

item.title: DJ Sadat Valentine presents Urban Mafia Radio - Breakbeat, Hiphop and Funky Beats
item.description:
Show Air Date: Sunday July 30th 2006

Dj Sadat Valentine brings you - Beatz and Breakz for your A$$. Every Sunday Night @ 7pm.

Well back from a needed vacation with the in laws. So I am ready to drop it for you all.I hope you are ready because I am :) I hope all has been well with my family out there online. I missed you all. Sit back an relax it's gonna be a fun one. Peace and love as always to my fans.Please make sure to hit me up at my Myspace page and now enjoy the show.


Urban Mafia Radio a division of Urban Mafia Entertainment

item.title: DJ Sadat Valentine presents Urban Mafia Radio - Breakbeat, Hiphop and Funky Beats
item.description:
Show Air Date: Sunday July 9th 2006

Dj Sadat Valentine brings you - Beatz and Breakz for your A$$. Every Sunday Night @ 7pm.

Wussup to my fav beatz and breakz heads out there. After a long weekend of gigs and partying I thought I would bless the tables with a real chill show tonight. We start this show with some nice drum n bass then we take you up to some real hiphop. I hope you like it, a little something to get your week off to a great start. Peace and love as always to my fans.Please make sure to hit me up at my Myspace page and now enjoy the show.


Urban Mafia Radio a division of Urban Mafia Entertainment

item.title: DJ Sadat Valentine presents Urban Mafia Radio - Breakbeat, Hiphop and Funky Beats
item.description:
Show Air Date: Sunday July 2nd 2006

Dj Sadat Valentine brings you - Beatz and Breakz for your A$$. Every Sunday Night @ 7pm.

Thank you all for our continuing success. We here at UMR have great things coming up so stay tuned everyweek. This week we have nothing but breaks and hiphop. Sit back and grab somebody and lets do this.Please make sure to hit me up at my Myspace page and now enjoy the show.


Urban Mafia Radio a division of Urban Mafia Entertainment

item.title: DJ Sadat Valentine presents Urban Mafia Radio - Breakbeat, Hiphop and Funky Beats
item.description:
Show Air Date: Sunday June 25th 2006

Dj Sadat Valentine brings you - Beatz and Breakz for your A$$. Every Sunday Night @ 7pm.

Well Well, good to see you all again. Another adventure of Sadat Valentine and UMR. Tonight I have a treat for all you lovers of da Old School. I got Electro Breaks, 80s Hiphop and Hardcore from the early 90s.I want to take you all on a trip to the past because as they say "we can't know where we are going till we know where we have been".Also make sure you listen for details for the giveaways.Please make sure to hit me up at my Myspace page and now enjoy the show.


Urban Mafia Radio a division of Urban Mafia Entertainment

item.title: DJ Sadat Valentine presents Urban Mafia Radio - Breakbeat, Hiphop and Funky Beats
item.description:
Show Air Date: Sunday June 4th 2006

Dj Sadat Valentine brings you - Beatz and Breakz for your A$$. Every Sunday Night @ 7pm.

This week a little something for everybody. Some of this and some of that , all mixed up to give ya a little flava for you butt.

Welcome to the biggest & most up-to-date Breakz, Hiphop and Drum n Bass radio show on the internet. This Radio Show was started back in 2000 but soon went off air in 03. Well, I am BACK! Please make sure to hit me up at my Myspace page and now enjoy the show.


Urban Mafia Radio a division of Urban Mafia Entertainment
